div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Feb. 27, 1896. ATTORNEY NICODEM L. PIOTROWSKI CANDIDATE FOR ALDERMAN OF THE SIXTH WARD

body.p: We are reliably informed, that Attorney N. L. Piotrowski, well known in Bridgeport, intends to be a candidate for alderman of the Sixth Ward. Mr. Piotrowski will probably receive the nomination on the Democratic ticket; if this does not happen, he intends to run on an independent ticket.
